org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.support.query

Class QueryUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.support.query.QueryUtilBase<CmisQueryWalker>
      • org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.support.query.QueryUtil
  • Deprecated.

    public class QueryUtil
extends QueryUtilBase<CmisQueryWalker>
    Support class to assist in parsing and processing CMIS queries. This class inherits from QueryUtilBase to use the error handling methods. It does not follow its design and is only maintained for backwards compatibility.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.support.query.QueryUtilBase

        Perform the first phase of query processing. Setup lexer and parser, parse the statement, check for syntax errors and create an AST

      • walkStatement

        public void walkStatement()
                   throws CmisQueryException,
                          org.antlr.runtime.RecognitionException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: QueryUtilBase
        Perform the second phase of query processing, analyzes the select part, check for semantic errors, fill the query object. Usually a walker will be CmisQueryWalker (or subclass) if the supporting OpenCMIS query classes are used.
        Specified by:
        walkStatement in class QueryUtilBase<CmisQueryWalker>
        Throws:
        org.antlr.runtime.RecognitionException
        CmisQueryException

        public static CmisQueryWalker getWalker(String statement)
                                 throws org.antlr.runtime.RecognitionException
        Deprecated. 
        Parse a CMISQL statement and return a tree that can be walked to evaluate the expression of the query (usually not used directly but through traverseStatement)
        Parameters:
        statement - CMISQL statement
        Returns:
        an AntLR tree grammar that can be traversed to evaluate the query

        Deprecated. 
        Parse and process a CMISQL statement using the higher level support classes
        Parameters:
        statement - CMISQL statement
        queryObj - CMIS query object filled with information what data need to be retrieved
        pw - predicate walker that evaluates the where clause

        AntLR tree grammar created by this statement
